channel.title: rant on Existential with Zayyan
channel.description: Recent content in rant on Existential with Zayyan

item.title: Linux is not for the everyday somewhat power user
item.description: Whenever, I go on YouTube I have started to see a flurry of videos that are either about: Gaming on Linux which usually conclude with Linux has come a long way and how it was like building custom kernels in the earlier days Praising a distro and how it is good enough for a regular user Comparing Windows and Linux and how Windows is crap and Linux is ultimate conqueror of the Earth, or Linus Torvalds being outrageously funny and an asshole to people (specially NVIDIA, which they kind of deserve).
